about_the_game:
Embark on an extraordinary journey in "Elemental Ascent," a charming indie third-person platformer that invites you to explore the magnificence and might of nature. Channel the ancient powers of earth, air, fire, and water as you navigate your way up the treacherous mountain, seeking to complete your familial rite of passage and ring the gong of enlightenment.

Discover the subtle art of elemental control, using earth, air, fire, and water to solve puzzles and surmount obstacles. Use the elements to craft your path using your wit and creativity.

Immerse yourself in a heartfelt narrative centered around themes of family, legacy, and humility. As you ascend, you'll encounter stories that resonate with the essence of human connection, adding depth and warmth to your adventure.

Engage your mind with thoughtfully designed puzzles that challenge without overwhelming. Each puzzle encourages you to explore the environment and use your elemental abilities in clever, unassuming ways.

Unearth the stories of the mountain and its inhabitants as you progress. From fleeting encounters with curious creatures to hidden messages left by past travellers, every detail speaks of a world waiting to be discovered.

name: Elemental Ascent

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 1024MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

short_description: Master the powers of earth, wind, water and fire to ascend the mountain's peak in this open world third-person puzzle platformer. A lore-rich world is waiting to be discovered in this heartfelt story-driven adventure, focusing on key themes such as family, legacy and humility.
